products.title: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room.  Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  Splash Snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A whiteelectric roller blind easily brightens up the space,  and our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.   This off-white blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter,  a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.  Why not pair with our Smart Hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This white electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2138 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Silver UV-Reflecting Thermal Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Eco Friendly FR White Recycled Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Eco Friendly FR White Recycled Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Recycled Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Eco-Friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! 
 
Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  White doesnt have to mean stark. This white roller blind creates a fresh and smart finish, meaning you have a perfect base to accessorise the room as muh as you want! Upgrade to a wireless control to control your blinds via your mobile, Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub!  
 
At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made electric roller blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind!
